metadata.dc:author: Monzón, F J
Merck, N
Ochoa, L
Soriano, P
Díaz de Liaño, A
metadata.dc:description: Retroperitoneal tumors of lipomatous origin are usually liposarcomas. Only a minority of adipose tumors of the retroperitoneum show histological criteria of benignity. We present the case of a 52-year-old woman, diagnosed of a retroperitoneal lipoma with areas of myxoid degeneration. The tumor involved the left kidney and was resected completely.
metadata.dc:title: Lipoma retroperitoneal (con áreas de degeneración mixoide).
[Retroperitoneal lipoma (with areas of myxoid degeneration)].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
